perturbation.original_text: Fees: The Fees for the Project shall be $279,000.00 Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer: 20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #2. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4. *Milestone Delivery Schedule for Phase 1 Milestone #1 -January 1st, 2019 Milestone #2- February 1st, 2019. Milestone #3 - March 1st, 2019. Milestone #4 - April 1st, 2019.
perturbation.changed_text: Fees: The Fees for the Project shall be $279,000.00 Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer: 20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #2. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4. *Milestone Delivery Schedule for Phase 1 Milestone #1 -January 1st, 2019 Milestone #2- February 1st, 2019. Milestone #3 - March 1st, 2019. Milestone #4 - April 1st, 2019. An additional 10% ($27,900.00) will be due June 1st, 2019. The final 10% ($27,900.00) will be due July 1st, 2019.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction. While the initial payment schedule outlines 5 payments of 20% each tied to specific milestones, the addition of two subsequent payments of 10% each creates uncertainty about the complete payment structure. This contradicts the initial explicit agreement on the payment schedule and the total percentage to be paid at each stage.

perturbation.original_text: Fees: The Fees for the Project shall be $279,000.00 Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer: 20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project.
perturbation.changed_text: Fees: The Fees for the Project shall be $279,000.00 Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer: 10% Deposit ($27,900.00) to be paid at the start of the project.
perturbation.explanation: The modification changes the deposit amount from 20% to 10%. This directly contradicts the following payment milestones which are calculated based on a 20% installment, thus creating a mismatch between the initial deposit and the remaining payments. This creates ambiguity around the amount of the deposit.

perturbation.original_text: o If no drivers are found, users will not be charged and will have the option to pick up the order in-store or browse for a new dispensary
perturbation.changed_text: o If no drivers are found, users will be charged a 5% service fee and will have the option to pick up the order in-store or browse for a new dispensary
perturbation.explanation: This alteration introduces a conflict: the original text states that users won't be charged if no drivers are available, while the modified text imposes a 5% service fee in the same situation. This directly contradicts the initial condition of not being charged. This creates ambiguity around the charging policy.
